displayName: CIS - Ensure loopback traffic is configured (ip)

var.name: 7ABE8FFE-7456-4FD1-A084-859D071B5B8F
var.value: nft create rule inet filter input ip saddr 127.0.0.0/8 counter drop

var.name: 7E9A3AA5-A697-4F88-8D3D-A02E27E1B5F8
var.value: nft list ruleset | awk '/hook input/,/}/' | grep 'ip sddr'

var.name: F73D12E6-725A-4602-9299-48E33823EDCD
var.value: ip saddr 127.0.0.0/8 counter packets 0 bytes 0 drop
